message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our product to you. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can discuss the details further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your offer, but would like to propose a price of $1050000. This is a fair compromise between our initial prices, and I believe it will be beneficial for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1050000. I'd be willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your valuation of the product. In light of our discussions, I am prepared to offer the product to you at a price of $1000000. I believe this is a fair compromise, providing a good balance between our interests.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'd be willing to pay $980000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. Considering our previous discussions and your valuation of the product, I am willing to offer the product to you at a price of $990000. This represents a significant compromise and I believe it will be a mutually beneficial arrangement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $980000, but I was thinking we could do a bit better than that. How about $985000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your continued interest in our product. Considering the value it brings to your business, I am willing to accept a price of $990000 for the product. I believe this represents a fair compromise that benefits both parties.
